name: Bewilderment
description:
A Mini Ludim Dare 73 game. Try to find a hidden meaning if you want

Internet connection is required. You'll see why

Farland Skies Skybox: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#/content/62565

Skybox Volume 2 (Nebula): https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#/content/3392

Low Res Shader: https://github.com/SvDvorak/Shaders

SimpleJSON: http://wiki.unity3d.com/index.php/SimpleJSON

Bosca Ceoil: https://terrycavanagh.itch.io/bosca-ceoil
